mapper.insert: insert into project(p_id, p_name, p_pmid, p_start, p_end, p_crew, p_memo) values(NVL((select MAX(p_id) from project)+1,0), #{p_name}, #{p_pmid}, #{p_start}, #{p_end},#{p_crew},#{p_memo})
mapper.select: select * from member where m_email like '%'|| #{email}||'%' or m_name like '%'|| #{email}||'%'
select p_pmid from project where p_id = #{projectId}

select (select count(*) from checklist where check_projectid = #{projectId }) as count, (select count(*) from checklist where check_projectid = #{projectId } AND CHECK_SIGN=1) as done, (select count(*) from checklist where check_projectid = #{projectId } AND check_type=1) as usecase, (select count(*) from checklist where check_projectid = #{projectId } AND check_type=2) as usediagram, (select count(*) from checklist where check_projectid = #{projectId } AND check_type=3) as uml, (select count(*) from checklist where check_projectid = #{projectId } AND check_type=4) as erd, (select count(*) from checklist where check_projectid = #{projectId } AND check_type=5) as image from dual
